pages.text: $(li)The Hair of Bear can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/knockback_resistance)Potion of Knockback Resistance$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/falconry_glove)Falconry Glove$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/alexsmobs/banner_patterns)Banner Pattern$(/l), or the $(l:patchouli:armors/frontier_cap)Frontiersman's Cap$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/grizzly_bear)Grizzly Bear$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
